Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone for the Money
Reviews.Author: Trevor L "God is on the side of the army with...
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an expensive T-Mobile phone for my wife. The Alcatel One Touch Fierce is a responsive Andriod phone with plenty of screen space and lots of horesepower for those on a budget.  With it's 1.2 Ghz, four-core processor and 1GB RAM it provides plenty of power to run multiple apps and stream your music, movies and games. The 4.5", 240dpi screen is great on the eyes.  Though the onboard storage is only 2GB it does feature a handy microSD slot where you can quickly and cheaply expand it to 32GB. Battery life is great owing to it's large battery and efficient operating system. The camera app is extra cool with lots of nifty settings to help you take the perfect photos. It even has a built-in radio receiver. My wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: good, but definitely not worth it
Reviews.Author: Mor and Tookie
Reviews.Content: This is a nice-looking phone - it's got a large screen and is thin and light.  It also has plenty of space for apps which is great.  However, it has a lot of drawbacks and, as much as i hate to say it, i regret buying this phone.The touch-screen is not precise and it often takes me 2 or 3 attempts at pressing a specific button/keyboard letter before it finally clicks on the correct one.  On a related note, the swype typing feature on this phone often puts random capital letters in the middle of the word (ie: hEllo).The worst thing about this phone though is probably its camera.  It's 5 megapixel which is plenty, but it doesn't have the ability to focus properly.  As a result, unless you're a specific distance from your subject, your picture will be a little blurry (or a lot blurry).  This is especially annoying since i'm not able to use my bank's phone app to deposit checks (the app keeps telling me that the picture is too blurry).The last thing I dislike about the camera feature is the lag from the time i press the 'capture' button, to the time it actually takes the picture.  While better than my previous phone, it's still long enough that i often miss the shot.Bottom line, this phone would have been amazing if the screen was precise and the camera was able to focus.  Until it has those features (probably never), i would not recommend buying this phone.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel
Reviews.Content: its good, the equipment is very nice, he have much application and its used very easy. thank you for all.I need more equipment coming soon

Reviews.Title: My experiences
Reviews.Author: The Tablet Man3000
Reviews.Content: It took longer than the 2 day shipping promised from MetroPCS but it was $50 cheaper from another source. So I will update this review soon.Review 0.1: Well I researched before buying this phone and it seems people aren't telling the truth this phone had from mixed to personally unfavorable results. After using this for 2.5 days it's worked as I would expect from a Quad-core processor and 1 GB RAM it's far snappier than some tablets I have used. It has Android 4.2.2(no users support). It has about 2GB for the user to use out of the 4GB for storage(Android OS takes about half of this device storage). The performance is comparable to the nexus 7 so far which is GOOD. Haven't had a lockup yet! I can multi-task easy. You may ask how much is its capabilities for Multi-tasking? the answer is simple I can opened 10 apps, at once, so far I tried but I had file transfers and FTP file sharing while download a huge file not a problem for this phone! I found myself in somber cause I had the Nokia 521 but windows phone 8 is so limited especially when my friend was showing off his S4, well this phone don't have any S4 problems that the S4 has and I can download and copy to my computer directly without work a rounds that I don't know if its safe or not<like Windows phone 8 has!Rating as of 2.5 days:Battery(non Removable minus 1.0): 10 hours of moderate usage. Good news, phone never gotten hot which is great for winter time lol no pocket warmers with this phone! At least, the hardware will last longer since it's not heated/overheated as muchOverall rating 4.0 out of 5!=SPerformance: Quad-core at it's finest! performance is level with Nexus 7 as far as I am concerned same with app compatibility only thing is that some apps is developed for the Tegra 3 or 4  which is annoying. Plays Plants VS. Zombies really well no slow ups so far! can get the same resume as the nexus 7 from multitasking overall a nice performance. Cellular Data not as restrictive as windows phone was, however spots sometimes that allowed full 4G capability had strange slow ups (minus 0.5 points) but they are switching to 4g from wifi and random ones are brief not terrible long times some stopped downloads but not complaining since it don't happen often at all! Got service underground where my windows phone struggled!Overall rating 4.5 out of 5!=SSStorage: 4.0 GB (2.0 GB available to the user not really a disadvantage since you get free 5 GB from google drive) expanded upto 32 GB officially but I plugged in a 64 GB flash drive so that's wrong :) That's right I said flash drive, but I have that ability since I own a nexus 7 they use the same USB micro type I Purchased the OTG cables I needed!Overall Rating 5.0!!!=SSSDurability: Well I dropped it on the floor no harm done :) Not waterproof by any degree minus 1 point why is this so important? well maybe you don't like using your phone in the rain? What if it's an important call and a lucky rain drop hits your mic or speaker that could mean your phone stops working maybe just the mic or speaker if your lucky that's why its important get a headset Bluetooth or wired!Overall 4.0 out of 5!=S

Reviews.Title: Very bad experience with this phone
Reviews.Author: Pavel Maksimenko
Reviews.Content: I would recommend you stay away from this phone. It started tripping up on me only two months after I got it. After rebooting it, it worked fine for a little bit but than kept doing some crazy stuff within a month or so.. Three reboots later I gave up and got a new phone ( less than 5 months of having the phone). I only downloaded about 2 apps and had no music on the phone and barely did any browsing so, it was not malfunctioning because of overload. Had a tiny crack in the corner so lost all my $ on it. Very sleek phone and slips really easy from your hands. If you do buy one, a cover is a must right away.  It's a cute phone and easy to use but even a lady from Metro PCS store says they are having lots of problems with phone... Beware!

Reviews.Title: Everything is top notch but the camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Midura
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as my first foray into the smartphone world in a few years. My main goal was to get something that had little to no lag in the interface and a decent screen. I first bought the Nokia Lumia Windows phone and had some problems so I brought it back. I ended up with this and overall am very happy. I find that this phone is great for someone looking for an introduction to what an Android handset could be. It has it's flaws, but unless you need a camera, talk on the phone often or need wide viewing angles, then this is THE phone to get on Metro PCS.Pros: Build is solid, this feels almost like it could be an Apple product. Big screen is a plus. Smooth interface, this runs much smoother than the Samsung Galaxy phones or anything else on Metro PCS. LED Notification light, it's only 1 color, but better than none. WiFi Calling/Texting works great for texting but there's some interference over calls. The battery is excellent, I've done nothing to the settings and I easily go all day on the battery while using it often. Overall a great user experience.Cons: Colors get washed out quickly when not viewing screen directly, poor viewing angles. Ear becomes quickly uncomfortable with phone to ear due to "sharp" edges, I use sharp as a term since I can't think of another term. Camera is absolutely awful, don't expect to take any photos worth framing. The flash is awful and doesn't actually work on pictures, it's offset too far for it to do anything! The video capture is awful and laggy. Overall the camera experience is so sub-par I thought I was using a phone from a dumbphone.If you want a phone for good picture quality or if you talk often on the phone then this isn't for you. If you want a phone that will provide the most seamless Android experience on Metro PCS when doing everything else then get this. This runs leaps and bounds smoother than the Samsung Galaxy phones. Hey Samsung, keep your damn "touchwiz" off your phones and you could compete.

Reviews.Title: Very smooth,for a "Nice" deal...(Metro Pcs)
Reviews.Author: Jim Lahey
Reviews.Content: Owned for About 3 weeks now,and I must say,im very surprised.After all the reviews ive read,good and bad,I still went on and bought 1_"These are my Opinions".It has a very smooth design,coupled with a  comfortable fit in your hand.The Display,is pretty nice but with the 4.5" screen, it picks up the slack.The only problem,is the imbedded battery,which rates it at only 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: On the surface, its a smartphone. Major technical problems underneath.
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Within the first six months of me owning this phone it showed significant technical problems that make this phone a bare to use. I am someone who takes care of their phones. My last smartphone lasted me over 2 years. I hate this current phone with a passion.It constantly freezes and automatically resets itself, especially WHEN I ANSWER PHONE CALLS. Is this how far we have gotten in technology? Our phones can send tweets to millions around the world but won't answer phone calls. Worst part, the makers of this phone have no idea how to fix this issue and many people have had the same problem. Factory reset does not fix the problem and it will force you to re-download all your apps.In addition, the touch screen quality is below par from phones such as an iphone. Sending texts can become a chore because you will click the wrong letters several times in one sentence.Here's my favorite brilliant design feature: a 5mp camera with NO AUTOFOCUS. I don't care if it was 5 megapixels or 555 megapixels. If my picture is out of focus, it is going to look blurry regardless of how many damn megapixels.This phone is obviously intended to be an affordable smartphone. However, I encourage everyone out there to spend the extra 50-100 dollars and buy a phone that is actually worth having.I want to note that I have no beef with android. I think android makes great software and is a great alternative to iphones. The Alcatel One Fierce is NOT that alternative.BUYERS YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Yamilka S. Feliz
Reviews.Content: I live this phone. It's really fast and easy to use. It's beautiful. I do everything in this phone. I'm so happy for having bou

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: wayne buie
Reviews.Content: Amazing phone great service easy to use excellent battery life for long talk time and watching Netflix high five to the seller

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Annihilator
Reviews.Content: This phone is fast and reliable. Phone has not frozen once. Only paid $29 after rebate at METROPCS website.  Outstanding value for a phone with a quad core processor.  Battery life is on par with any other SAMSUNG, Lg or iPhone. No complaints,

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Leonard Y.
Reviews.Content: I have owned for 2 months. Great phone for the money. Nice size screen.  good fast performance. GPS.  The cons are fix battery, camera could be better in low light.  Make sure you use the electrical outlet charger to charge phone.  Phone charges extremely slow on other sources.  For 40.00 you cannot go wrong buying this phone.  Great starter phone for student or a gift.

Reviews.Title: worth it
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Product works. Only downer is the camera has no auto focus abd no gorilla glass but overall the phone works.the packaging was good and sturdy kept the product safe, not a scratch

Reviews.Title: Great phone but
Reviews.Author: Mr.Sand
Reviews.Content: It is a great phone, blazing fast, great camera. But be advised it will only work for metroPCs unless you find a way past the Sim Me unlock code. So if you bought this for intended purposes to use with any other company, then you will have to jump through hoops to get it to work and you are better off getting a phone from your service provider.

Reviews.Title: good cellphone for the price.
Reviews.Author: PORD
Reviews.Content: i got mine in a metroPCS store. its actually a good phone, it looks good and specs are great but still its a cheap phone and there are still some bad things on it like the keyboard, sometimes it takes 2-3x press before it will type the letter. also the battery, for the 1st two days the battery is not draining fast but now it drains fast even if im not using it, i even turned off apps and adjusted some settings. there are no text ringtones in settings either which is not a big deal. text and notification tone is the same on this phone unlike the other phones which is different, also its bad in getting wifi i was disappointed with this one but fine with it now just use data, bluetooth sometimes doesnt work too. Im still happy and contented with this phone its cheap and nice looking and as long as its still working for me its still ok rather than buying $500-$600 4g phone.

Reviews.Title: 4+ stars This phone is Amazing
Reviews.Author: Angelique Morales
Reviews.Content: To be honest this is a heck of a phone for 100$ not anything to sneeze at.It's very responsive. To deal with the keyboard inaccuracy I downloaded a replacement which is wonderful. It's very quick to open apps. Haven't been able to edit the number of home screens or callibrate the phone which may be why it goes a Lil haywire if you move it from your ear while talking. For me this is still a 4+ phone for the price I'd reccomend it. It's the perfect intermediate size with a 4.5 inch screen! Happy buying! This phone is a must have!!

Reviews.Title: Easy phone almost like and iphone
Reviews.Author: LadeeDee "Diana Russ"
Reviews.Content: This phone is cool for people that don't want to spend thousands of dollars like other phones. It gets the job done but is a little slower than most smartphones. Sometimes it gets a little frozen, the volume could be a little louder, and the picture quality is not all that great but otherwise its a cool phone. I really just needed a phone for simple tasks and all of my friends have it so I figured I try it. And I'm satisfied. I guess like the saying goes, "You get what you pay for."  But if I had to do it over again I still would purchase this phone over an iphone. And besides no contract, unlimited talk, text and data for a fraction of what you would pay with an iphone, Priceless!!

Reviews.Title: Charging Alcatel One Fierce
Reviews.Author: Charles D Arnold
Reviews.Content: Battery problems. Very inconsistent charging. Sometimes charging the phone takes a long time and more often it does not accept the charge. Overnight charging might produce a 1% increase. Next time it might charge right away. Another problem is that the icons move too easily.

Reviews.Title: Love it !!!
Reviews.Author: Delores Moran
Reviews.Content: Hi one of my sons bought me and another one of my sons this phone a few days ago and we absolutely love this phone. The price paid for this phone cannot be beat.The service is great and the phone itself is phenomenal. Very simple to use and takes great photos.The photos come out very clear. I absolutely love this phone.

Reviews.Title: Right phone...WRONG carrier sent
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: The phone said it was a T-mobile phone in the Amazon listing...the phone I received was for Metro PCS and I could not use it with my family mobile plan. It caused me to have to wait over 2 weeks to return it and get my money credited back to my account. I am self employed and rely heavily on my cell to connect with my customers...so it made things very INCONVENIENT on my end.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: francis guzman
Reviews.Content: improve the product was what I thought todad have the correct information as the instructions said the product is good but if it is for outside the united states that desbloquiarlo hai but is rather the product prctico

ProductInfo.Features:
4.5 in qHD Display - a vivd screen for viewing photos, playing games and watchuing HD movies
Quad-Core Processor with 1GB RAM and 4 GB ROM & a Micro SD Slot for expandable memory
Android 4.2 - Jellybean
5 MB rear camera with LED flash and camcorder to capture, edit, create and share photos and videos in addition to a VGA front facing camera
Smooth multitasking experience allows you to simultaneously run multiple apps, games and access the internet
ProductInfo.Name: Alcatel One Fierce Prepaid Phone (MetroPCS)
